Starting at 3rd level, you harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a [[/r d6]]. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus, and they fuel various psionic powers you have, which are detailed below.

Some of your powers expend the Psionic Energy die they use, as specified in a power's description, and you can't use a power if it requires you to use a die when your dice are all expended. You regain all your expended Psionic Energy dice when you finish a long rest. In addition, as a bonus action, you can regain one expended Psionic Energy die, but you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

Psionic Powers

The powers below use your Psionic Energy dice:

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.Q7cPixi3D29NShOL]{Psi-Bolstered Knack} (3rd level)

Your psychic powers enable you to potentially succeed an ability check you would have failed.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.bhlZZTSBXJNCqNSx]{Psychic Whispers} (3rd level)

You can establish telepathic communication between yourself and others-perfect for quiet infiltration.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.Hv3gL4A2AzLMFwpn]{Homing Strikes} (9th level)

When attacking with your psychic blades, you can add your psionic energy die to your attack roll.

@UUID[Compendium.5e-complete.5e-class-features.fOONIWzvcbmkP9tH]{Psychic Teleportation} (9th level)

You can throw your psychic blade and teleport to it.

Note: This feature tracks your ability to regain a Psionic Energy die. To track your total number of Psionic Energy dice, use the @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.mVKtOzsuLaKbRJts]{Psionic Energy} feature. When using this feature to regain one expended energy die you must manually adjust uses on @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.mVKtOzsuLaKbRJts]{Psionic Energy}.
